name: Outline
title: getoutline.com
shortDescription: Outline is a team knowledge management tool designed to organize and share documents efficiently. It is ideal for teams looking to streamline documentation processes and enhance collaboration. Users can edit with markdown, search documents quickly, and integrate with tools like Slack. An example use case is a tech company managing project documentation, ensuring all team members have instant access to the latest updates.
pros: Powerful search and AI question answering
Integrations with Slack and other tools
